wind_howling_rock_formations.name: Wind Howling through Rock Formations
wind_howling_rock_formations.description: The eerie howling of the wind as it weaves through ancient, twisted rock formations

wind_canyon_lament.name: Wind Canyon Lament
wind_canyon_lament.description: The low moan of wind funneling through narrow desert canyons, like a distant lament

wind_cliff_whistle.name: Wind Cliff Whistle
wind_cliff_whistle.description: The high-pitched whistling of wind slicing through jagged cliffs at twilight

sand_cascading_dune.name: Sand Cascading Dune
sand_cascading_dune.description: The hypnotic whisper of sand grains cascading down a steep dune face

sand_sifting_crest.name: Sand Sifting Crest
sand_sifting_crest.description: The soft, rhythmic sifting of sand as it tumbles over a dune crest

sand_flowing_stones.name: Sand Flowing Around Stones
sand_flowing_stones.description: The gentle, persistent rasp of sand flowing around sun-scorched stones

lark_flute_calls.name: Lark Flute Calls
lark_flute_calls.description: The haunting, flute-like calls of the rare Mongolian lark echoing across the vast expanse

eagle_cry_plains.name: Eagle Cry Plains
eagle_cry_plains.description: The mournful cry of a lone steppe eagle soaring above the barren plains

wheatear_warble_outcrop.name: Wheatear Warble Outcrop
wheatear_warble_outcrop.description: The melodic warble of a desert wheatear perched on a rocky outcrop

crickets_chirping_stars.name: Crickets Chirping Under Stars
crickets_chirping_stars.description: The persistent, almost mechanical chirping of bioluminescent desert crickets under the stars

cicada_clicks_grass.name: Cicada Clicks Among Grass
cicada_clicks_grass.description: The sharp, staccato clicks of a solitary cicada hidden among dry grass

beetle_buzzing_air.name: Beetle Buzzing Through Air
beetle_buzzing_air.description: The eerie, rhythmic buzzing of a night-active beetle flitting through the air

camel_grunts_sands.name: Camel Grunts in Sands
camel_grunts_sands.description: The guttural, almost conversational grunts of Bactrian camels trudging through moonlit sands

yak_bellows_vegetation.name: Yak Bellows Grazing
yak_bellows_vegetation.description: The deep, resonant bellows of wild yaks grazing on sparse desert vegetation

leopard_growl_edge.name: Leopard Growl at Edge
leopard_growl_edge.description: The low, rumbling growl of a distant snow leopard prowling near the desert edge

footsteps_crunch_salt.name: Footsteps Crunch on Salt
footsteps_crunch_salt.description: The sharp, crunching sound of footsteps breaking through a crust of sun-baked salt flats

hooves_thud_earth.name: Hooves Thudding on Earth
hooves_thud_earth.description: The muffled thud of hooves as a herd of wild asses trots across hard-packed earth

mud_crackle_wanderer.name: Mud Crackle Under Wanderer
mud_crackle_wanderer.description: The brittle crackle of dried mud breaking under the weight of a solitary wanderer

fox_yips_dunes.name: Fox Yips Across Dunes
fox_yips_dunes.description: The distant, otherworldly yips of desert foxes communicating across the dunes

wolves_howls_fringe.name: Wolves Howling at Fringe
wolves_howls_fringe.description: The plaintive howls of a pack of wolves hunting along the desert fringe

fox_barks_twilight.name: Fox Barks in Twilight
fox_barks_twilight.description: The short, sharp barks of a red fox echoing through the twilight

spring_babble_minerals.name: Spring Babble with Minerals
spring_babble_minerals.description: The unexpected babble of a hidden spring, its water tinged with the scent of ancient minerals

stream_gurgle_oasis.name: Stream Gurgle in Oasis
stream_gurgle_oasis.description: The gurgling laughter of a tiny, secluded stream winding through a rocky oasis

droplets_plinking_pool.name: Droplets Plinking in Pool
droplets_plinking_pool.description: The gentle plinking of water droplets falling into a clear, deep desert pool

herders_chanting_jewelry.name: Herders Chanting with Jewelry
herders_chanting_jewelry.description: The faint, rhythmic chanting of nomadic herders blending with the gentle clinking of their jewelry

elders_song_campfire.name: Elder's Song by Campfire
elders_song_campfire.description: The soft murmur of an elder’s song carried on the wind from a distant campfire

instrument_hum_stars.name: Instrument Hum Under Stars
instrument_hum_stars.description: The quiet, melodious hum of a traditional string instrument played under the stars

bushes_rustle_spirits.name: Bushes Rustling Like Spirits
bushes_rustle_spirits.description: The dry, rattling rustle of thorny saxaul bushes, sounding like the whispers of long-forgotten spirits

reeds_clatter_lake.name: Reeds Clattering by Lake
reeds_clatter_lake.description: The brittle clatter of dry reeds swaying in the breeze near an ephemeral lake

grasses_rustle_creature.name: Grasses Rustling by Creature
grasses_rustle_creature.description: The subtle hiss of desert grasses bending and snapping under the weight of a small creature

viper_hiss_sand.name: Viper Hiss Beneath Sand
viper_hiss_sand.description: The almost imperceptible hiss of a horned viper gliding just beneath the sand's surface

lizard_scrape_dunes.name: Lizard Scraping Dunes
lizard_scrape_dunes.description: The stealthy scrape of a sandfish lizard burrowing into the warm dunes

scarab_rustle_soil.name: Scarab Rustling in Soil
scarab_rustle_soil.description: The delicate rustle of a scarab beetle navigating through dry, loose soil

thunder_boom_storm.name: Thunder Boom During Storm
thunder_boom_storm.description: The sudden, cracking boom of thunder reverberating off the desert floor during a rare storm

thunder_rumble_landscape.name: Thunder Rumble Over Landscape
thunder_rumble_landscape.description: The ominous rumble of distant thunder rolling over the barren landscape

lightning_crackle_plain.name: Lightning Crackle Over Plain
lightning_crackle_plain.description: The sharp crackle of lightning splitting the sky above a parched desert plain

vehicle_growl_landscape.name: Vehicle Growl Across Landscape
vehicle_growl_landscape.description: The distant, low growl of an off-road vehicle echoing like a phantom through the desolate landscape

motorcycle_hum_canyons.name: Motorcycle Hum in Canyons
motorcycle_hum_canyons.description: The faint hum of a motorcycle engine reverberating off distant canyon walls

caravan_clank_routes.name: Caravan Clank Along Routes
caravan_clank_routes.description: The metallic clank of a caravan’s wheels as it traverses ancient trade routes

sandstorm_roar_instruments.name: Sandstorm Roar with Instruments
sandstorm_roar_instruments.description: The overpowering, deafening roar of a sandstorm, with the sand particles striking like tiny, relentless percussion instruments

sandstorm_hiss_tent.name: Sandstorm Hiss Against Tent
sandstorm_hiss_tent.description: The relentless hiss of sand whipping against a tent during a fierce gale

dust_whirlwind_flurry.name: Dust Whirlwind Flurry
dust_whirlwind_flurry.description: The chaotic flurry of grit and dust swirling around in a sudden desert whirlwind
